Package InternshipSystem

Class CSVDataRepositoryControl

Object
CSVDataRepositoryControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataRepositoryControl
public class CSVDataRepositoryControl extends Object implements DataRepositoryControl
Implements the DataRepositoryControl interface for CSV file operations. Provides methods to read, append, and update data in CSV files.

    • readData

      public String[][] readData(String filename, int maxRows, int maxCols)
      Reads data from a CSV file and returns it as a 2D array.
      Specified by:
      readData in interface DataRepositoryControl
      Parameters:
      filename - The name of the CSV file to read from.
      maxRows - The maximum number of rows to read.
      maxCols - The maximum number of columns to read.
      Returns:
      A 2D array containing the data read from the CSV file.

      Appends a line of data to a CSV file.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      line - The line of data to append.

      Updates the company representative data in a CSV file.

      filename - The name of the CSV file to update.
      reps - The array of company representatives.
      repCount - The number of company representatives.
